Title: Waives the residency requirement for appointed public officers employed by Putnam county
Summary: Waives the residency requirement for appointed public officers employed by Putnam county provided that such person resides in the state of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to waiving the residency requirement for appointed public officers employed by Putnam county
